item.title: Saddam to Declare Candidacy for Iraqi Elections
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Overthrown Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein, who was arrested by US forces last December, reportedly plans to run as a candidate in the Iraqi elections scheduled for January 2005. (Link courtesy of Counterspin Central)
item.excerpt:encoded: Overthrown Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein, who was arrested by US forces last December, reportedly plans to run as a candidate in the Iraqi elections scheduled for January 2005. (Link courtesy of Counterspin Central)
